## Load Libraries

```{r}

if(!require("pacman")) install.packages("pacman")

pacman::p_load(
  RStoolbox,
  tidyverse
)

```

## Load Data

Classify image

```{r}

uc <- RStoolbox::unsuperClass(lsat, nClasses = 3)
```

Plot image

```{r}

RStoolbox::ggR(uc$map, geom_raster = T, forceCat = T) +
  ggplot2::scale_fill_manual(values = c("darkgreen", "blue", "sandybrown"))
```
